%pyspark
#CSV
data1 = [(1,),(2,),(3,)]
dColumns = ["dept_id"]
data2 = spark.createDataFrame(data=data1, schema = dColumns)
data2.write.csv('dataset.csv')

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
dept = [("Finance",10), 
        ("Marketing",20), 
        ("Sales",30), 
        ("IT",40) 
      ]
deptColumns = ["dept_name","dept_id"]
deptDF = spark.createDataFrame(data=dept, schema = deptColumns)
deptDF.printSchema()
deptDF.show(truncate=False)
